wfh.title: Health Status Daily Report
wfh.description: As your well being is our top priority, please strongly follow the company COVID-19 guidelines. Please submit Health Status Daily Report 2 times per day for workday (07.00 a.m. - 08.00 a.m. , 04.30 p.m. - 05.30 p.m.) and 1 time per day if you take leave or for weekend or holiday within 05.00 p.m.
wfh.welcome2: when you submit this form. The owner will be able to see your name and email address.

WorkStatus.question: Please select your status
WorkStatus.answer3: Annual leave, sick Leave, other leave or holiday

PersonInteractedWith.question: Whom do you has close contact to?

RiskLevel.question: Risk Self-Assessment
RiskLevel.description2: F0 = You have tested positive for COVID-19
RiskLevel.description3: F1 = You have had close contact with F0
RiskLevel.description4: F2 = You have had close contact with F1 or you have came back from 19 countries which company announced as Group1
RiskLevel.description5: F3 = You have had close contact with F2, or people who came back from 19 countries which company announced as group1, or you have came back from contries which are not in Group1
RiskLevel.description6: F4 =  you have had close contact with people who came back from contries which are not in Group1
RiskLevel.answer1: You have tested positive for COVID-19
RiskLevel.answer2: You have had close contact with F0
RiskLevel.answer3: You have had close contact with F1
RiskLevel.answer4: You have had close contact with F2
RiskLevel.answer5: You have had close contact with people who came back from contries which are not in Group1

F2RiskDesc.question: What Group of F2 are you in?
F2RiskDesc.answer1: You have had close contact with F1
F2RiskDesc.answer2: You have came back from 19 countries which company announced as Group1

F3RiskDesc.question: What Group of F3 are you in?
F3RiskDesc.answer1: You have had close contact with F2, or people who came back from 19 countries which company announced as group1
F3RiskDesc.answer2: You have came back from contries which are not in Group1
